content.value:
I write a weekly newsletter (devopsish.com) about DevOps, Cloud Native, Open Source, industry news, & culture

If you're underrepresented in tech and you have any RSS feed I can subscribe to (even if it's only GitHub) I would like to add it to my regular reading.
content.html: I write a weekly newsletter (devopsish.com) about DevOps, Cloud Native, Open Source, industry news, & culture If you're underrepresented in tech and you have any RSS feed I can subscribe to (even if it's only GitHub) I would like to add it to my regular reading.
